readable.title: 343662720_39e4067cd1
readable.content: A man asleep in a chair in front of a full bookshelf An older , balding man falling asleep on a chair in front of bookshelves . An old man dozes off near a bookshelf . An old man is sleeping at a table in front of a book shelf . This bald man , who appears to be asleep , is sitting at a table at a library .
